explanation: Funds are required for the replacement of helmets, body armor, plates and inserts, personal protection equipment, spare parts, optics, weapon accessories, and laser rangefinders transferred to Ukraine in support of the international effort to counter Russian aggression. This is an emergency budget requirement.
